official_title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to provide for the Office of Poet Laureate of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to establish the Office of the Poet Laureate of the United States.
